alert.note: Alert for Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Whiteside, northeastern Rock Island, northeastern Scott and south central Clinton Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Long Grove, or 9 miles north of Davenport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eldridge, Princeton, Long Grove, Cordova, McCausland, Rock Creek Marina and Campground, Folletts, Park View, Rock Creek Park, Scott County Park, and Princeton Wildlife Area. This includes Interstate 88 near mile marker 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
